Header: Four foreigners without valid visas arrested
Content: Four foreigners who were staying in the island without visas have been taken into custody. Two foreigners who were staying in the island without visas were arrested in a raid carried out by the Police in the Ukwatte area within the Avissawella Police Division. The two were Nigerian nationals aged 26 and 31 years. Meanwhile, two foreigners who were saying in the Sedawatte area within he Grandpass Police Division without visas have also been taken into custody. They are Pakistani nationals and the Grandpass Police have taken action to produce them in Courts.
